name: Add attribute
title: Adds the the specified attribute to the status

name: Remove attribute
title: Removes the specified attribute from the status

name: Copy attribute
title: Copies the value of a specified attribute to an attribute with specified name

name: Calculate value
title: Calcluates the value of a specified attribute using a specified expression

name: Determine random value
title: Sets the value of a specified attribute using a specified probability distribution

name: Choose value
title: Determines the value of a specified attribute according to a specified logic
